name: kraken

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Kraken is a system for assigning taxonomic labels to short DNA
sequences, usually obtained through metagenomic studies.

dependencies.name: jellyfish
dependencies.description:
JELLYFISH is a tool for fast, memory-efficient counting of k-mers in
DNA.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: roary
dependent_to.description: Rapid large-scale prokaryote pan genome analysis
